settings.title: #StarWarsFineJewelry
settings.subtitle: What is your favorite galactic moment?

settings.title: Excellence in Craftsmanship
settings.paragraph: Designed with unique and exquisite details in every piece, carefully crafted to bring the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry experience to life. The finest of designers with years of skilled training & precision to details, makes our craftsmanship excel in every aspect.

settings.step_info: Enjoy the Kyber<sup>TM</sup> Crystal Radiance Pendant in the dark!
settings.step_info_japanese: 暗闇で光るKyber Crystal Radiance Pendantをお楽しみください

settings.step_info: Remove flashlight inside the packaging and shine the light directly on the swiss blue topaz.
settings.step_info_japanese: パッケージに入っているフラッシュライトで、スイスブルートパーズを直接照らしてください

settings.step_info: Open your Star Wars Fine Jewelry packaging.
settings.step_info_japanese: Star Wars Fine Jewelryのパッケージを開封してください

settings.title: How to enjoy the kyber crystal radiance pendant at night
settings.title_japanese: カイバー・クリスタル・レイディアンスペンダント夜間使用法

settings.paragraph: The "Balance of the Force" collection. The bold and strong enforcer meets the Young Jedi. Consumed by the Dark Side, Lord Vader’s dark armor protects his true identity. Pushed to the edge of darkness the young Jedi must balance of the force within him. A timeless battle where fate meets destiny. The dark and sleek "Balance of the Force" collection symbolizes the fate of a Jedi Knight when consumed by the dark side. The forces of good and evil are strong enough to seduce anyone into the dark side. Never underestimate the power of the dark forces.
settings.paragraph_japanese: ”バランス・オブ・ザ・フォース”コレクション　勇敢で強靭な執行者が若いジェダイと出会う　ダークサイドによって使い尽くされ、ベイダー卿のダーク・アーマーが彼の正体を守る。暗闇に追い込まれたジェダイは内なるフォースを保たなければならない　運命が宿命に直面する終わりのない戦い　ザ・ダークと艶のある"バランス・オブ・ザ・フォース"コレクションはダークサイドに囚われたジェダイの騎士の象徴化　どんな人物でもダークサイドに引き摺り込む強力な善と悪のフォース　ダークフォースの力を見くびるべきでは無い

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by the Chewbacca™ the brave and mighty Wookiee loyal to the Rebel Alliance.
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by the Imperial Stormtroopers, the loyal and feared forces of the Empire.

settings.section_title-ja: 当社の他のコレクションをご覧ください

settings.title: Something unique
settings.text: If you are looking for something bold, exciting and unique. Find it right here with the new Kyber Crystal™ Radiance Pendant.

settings.section_subtitle: Embark on your Star Wars™ journey with the fine jewelry collection, designed to ignite your inner dark side or illuminate the light within.

settings.title: His & hers - The mandalorian
settings.title_japanese: 彼＆彼女- マンダロリアン
settings.text: Follow the way of The Mandalorian with rings made in high polish silver, complimented with a matt black rhodium T shape in resemblance of The Mandalorian’s helmet. Define your solid relationship with designs that mirror the shape of the armor of the human warrior clan.
settings.text_japanese: マンダロリアンのヘルメットに似たマットブラックのロジウムTシェイプをあしらった、ハイポリッシュシルバーで作られたリングでマンダロリアンの道をたどろう。人間の戦士の一族の鎧の形を反映したデザインとの強固な関係を特徴としたリング。

settings.title: His & hers - Celestial Love
settings.text: Say I DO with rings inspired by a celestial love that can withstand the greatest of odds. The Princess Leia™ wedding band features a delicate rose gold diamond design accented with white diamonds and destined to be paired with the Han Solo™ wedding band. The Han Solo™ wedding band features a black rhodium diamond design accented with black diamonds and destined to be paired with the Princess Leia™ wedding band.
settings.text_japanese: どの様な困難も乗り越えられる天体の愛にインスピレーションを受けた指輪で、”アイ・ドゥー”と受け入れる…　ローズゴールドデザインとダイアモンドにホワイトダイアモンドをアクセントにしたPrincess Leia™ウェディングバンドはHan Solo™ウェディングバンドとペアになる運命に…　ブラックロジウムのデザインにブラックダイアモンドをアクセントにしたHan Solo™ウェディングバンドはPrincess Leia™ウェディングバンドと永遠に…

settings.title: His & hers - C-3PoTM
settings.text: Show your commitment and say I DO with this C-3PO™ wedding band. This fine yellow gold band is designed to mirror the details of Threepio’s frame and mechanical build with white diamonds for a touch of elegance.
settings.text_japanese: C-3PO™のウェディングバンドと共に”アイ・ドゥー”と約束を。スリーピオの構造と性能を写し出したホワイトダイアモンドで優雅さを表したイエローゴールドでのデザイン。

settings.title: His & hers - Celestial Love
settings.text: Say I DO with rings inspired by a celestial love that can withstand the greatest of odds. The Princess Leia™ wedding band features a delicate rose gold quilt design accented with white diamonds and the Han Solo™ wedding band features a black rhodium quilt design accented with black diamonds. These rings are destined to be paired with each other.
settings.text_japanese: どの様な困難も乗り越えられる天体の愛にインスピレーションを受けた指輪で、”アイ・ドゥー”と受け入れる…　ローズゴールドのキルトデザインにホワイトダイアモンドをアクセントにしたPrincess Leia™ウェディングバンドと、ブラックロジウムのキルトデザインにブラックダイアモンドをアクセントにしたHan Solo™ウェディングバンド　　この二つはペアになる運命にあります。

settings.title: His & hers - R2-D2TM
settings.text: Join the rebellion and say I DO with this timeless R2-D2™ wedding band. Inspired by this loyal and lighthearted droid, a combination of white diamonds, and genuine blue sapphires are thoughtfully placed for a sophisticated look that will last forever.
settings.text_japanese: タイムレスなR2-D2™️ウェディングバントとともに反乱に加わり”アイ・ドゥー”と。忠実で明るいドロイドにインスプレーションを受けた、ホワイトダイアモンドとブルーサファイアを洗練にあしらった永遠のウェディングバンド。

settings.title: Featured
settings.subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua. At vero

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by Darth Vader™, the enforcer of the Galactic Empire.
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by the resiliency of Luke Skywalker™

settings.title: The Star Wars Experience!
settings.paragraph: Unveil your Star Wars™ adventure begins with the exquisite packaging created to withstand the hyperspace travel. The unique and illuminating package features outstanding galactic details designed exclusively for the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry Collection.
settings.vertical-text: MAY THE FORCE BE WITH YOU

settings.title: Dark Side
settings.paragraph: Let the dark side dominate your destiny with the sleek and edgy combination of metals, diamonds, and gemstones carefully designed to exemplify the power of the darkness. Each piece fashioned with bold details to command an Empire.
settings.ls_paragraph: Be consumed by the power and limitless possibilities of the Light Side. Let the light ignite your allegiance with the exquisite combination of metals, diamonds and gemstones. Each piece crafted with the delicate details of the iconic figures of the Alliance.

settings.contact-info:
Star Wars Fine Jewelry
3 East 54th Street, Suite #603,
New York, United States 10022

Mon-Fri 8 AM to 8 PM EST
Sat-Sun 11 AM to 8 PM EST

settings.heading: In a galaxy far far away..

settings.paragraph: The “Forces of the Galaxy” collection represents bravery and devotion to a greater cause when looked at from opposing sides. Collection details denote the mighty strength of legendary Wookiee™ warrior Chewbacca™ juxtaposed with the feared Stormtrooper forces of the Galactic Empire – both ready to defend what matters most in the galaxy. Inspired by courage and allegiance, join the forces of your galaxy with these resilient symbols of loyalty.

settings.title: Men's style highlights
settings.text: Find the most popular mens styles just right for your father this Father's Day!

settings.filter_tags: The Mandalorian, Into the Galaxy, Balance of Nature, Balance of the Force, Celestial Love, Forces of the Galaxy, Friendship

settings.title: Excellence in Craftsmanship
settings.paragraph: Designed with unique and exquisite details in every piece, carefully crafted to bring the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry experience to life. The finest of designers with years of skilled training & precision to details, makes our craftsmanship excel in every aspect.

Awaken an energy around us with the “Balance of Nature” collection inspired by the mystical planet of Dagobah™ and the lessons of Jedi Master Yoda™.  Knowledge shared between teacher and student reveals that strength flows not only from within, but also from without.  Through this collection, discover the balance of nature that grounds our surroundings and affirms the importance of our purpose in a grander environment.
settings.paragraph-ja: 神秘的な惑星Dagobah™とジェダイマスターYoda™の教えからインスピレーションを得た”自然のバランス”コレクションと共に、周りのエネルギーを呼び起こそう。師匠と弟子の間で交わされた知識は、内なるエネルギーの流れだけでなく、外部エネルギーもあらわにする。このコレクションを通し、私達の環境の元となる自然のバランスと、雄大な環境内での私達の目的の大切さを発見しよう。

settings.title: New Arrivals
settings.subtitle: The force is strong with these

settings.title: His & hers - Dark Armor
settings.title_japanese: 彼＆彼女- ダークアーマー
settings.text: The circle is now complete with this ring inspired by Darth Vader™, the enforcer of the Galactic Empire. Say I do to the dark side and together you can rule the galaxy with this sleek black rhodium and diamond wedding bands.
settings.text_japanese: サークルは、銀河帝国の執行者Darth Vader™にインスピレーションを受けたリングで完結する。この滑らかなブラックロジウムとダイアモンドウェディングバンドでダークサイドに”アイ・ドゥー”と銀河を支配。

settings.title: His & hers - Dark Armor
settings.title_japanese: 彼＆彼女- ダークアーマー
settings.text: The circle is now complete with these rings inspired by Darth Vader™, the enforcer of the Galactic Empire. Allow yourself to be seduced by the dark side, with the sleek black diamond framed rings. Designed to evoke Lord Vader’s powerful armor.
settings.text_japanese:
サークルは、Darth
Vader™にインスピレーションを受けたリングで完結する。ダースベイダーに魅惑された、滑らかなブラックダイアモンドリング。ヴェイダー卿の強力な鎧を呼び起こすかのようなデザイン。

settings.title: His & hers - Stormtrooper™
settings.text: Inspired by the Stormtrooper™. Join the loyal and feared forces of the Empire with this glossy black and white, his and hers ring. The sleek design accented with black diamonds is carefully crafted to mirror the stormtroopers protective armor.
settings.text_japanese: 光沢のある白黒の忠実で帝国に恐れられているStormtrooper™にインスピレーションを受けた彼と彼女のペアリング。ブラックダイアモンドをアクセントとした、滑らかで艶のあるストームトルーパーの鎧をあしらったデザイン。

settings.title: The Star Wars Experience!
settings.paragraph: Unveil your Star Wars™ adventure begins with the exquisite packaging created to withstand the hyperspace travel. The unique and illuminating package features outstanding galactic details designed exclusively for the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry Collection.

The “Celestial Love” collection generates a strength in commitment and a bond of love that can withstand the struggles of a galaxy in turmoil. Inspired by the courageous leadership of Princess Leia™ paired with the scoundrel heroism of Han Solo™, this special connection is a display of resilience and affection for a greater good. This collection is as charming, spirited and daring as the icons it epitomizes.

settings.title: The next chapter in the story of his & hers
settings.title_japanese: 彼と彼女の物語ー次章
settings.text: More than one story means more than one ring..
settings.text_japanese: ストーリーの数だけ、指輪の数がある…

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by R2-D2™ the devoted yet lighthearted Droid
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by C-3PO™ the spirited and intelligent protocol droid, loyal to Luke Skywalker ™ and lifelong companion to R2-D2™.

settings.title: Star Wars™ fine jewelry
settings.subtitle: About us
settings.paragraph:
Welcome to StarWarsFineJewelry.com, manufactured and fulfilled by Renaissance Global.

Renaissance Jewelry is part of Renaissance Global, a highly differentiated luxury lifestyle products company that designs, manufactures and sells fine jewelry to global retailers.

Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry is a collection inspired by classic Star Wars films and also features a bonus capsule collection inspired by The Mandalorian™. The unique and exclusive assortment offers a variety of covetable fashion and bridal pieces, designed to embody the most iconic figures in the galaxy. Explore the finest diamond and gemstone collection, each piece carefully crafted with exquisite detail.  Experience all Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry has to offer.  May the Force be with you.
settings.paragraph-ja:
ルネサンスグローバル社製造、履行のStarWarsFineJewelry.comへようこそ。

ルネサンスジュエリーはルネサンスグローバルのグループで、デザイン、製造さらに世界中の小売店に販売している高級ライフスタイル製品会社です。

Star Wars™️ファインジュエリーは、クラシックな映画スターウォーズにインスピレーションを受けたコレクションで、Mandalorian™️のイメージのボーナスカプセルコレクションも含まれます。このユニークで稀な品揃えは各種の魅力に我を忘れる程ファッショナブルで、ブライダル品やギャラクシーでの伝説の人物達を取り入れたデザインです。丹念に作り上げ、精巧な詳細のファインダイアモンドとジェムストーンコレクションをご覧ください。May the Force be with you

settings.text: Inspired by the guardians of peace and justice. Protect the galaxy with this pendant that evokes the glowing power and strength of your inner Jedi.
settings.text_japanese: ガーディアンの平和と正義にインスピレーションを受けたペンダント。あなたの内なるジェダイの力の輝きと力を呼び起こすこのペンダントで銀河を守ろう

settings.newsletter_form_heading: Be the first to know when we launch.

settings.title: Father'day Gift Guide
settings.sub_title: THERE IS A NEW WAY TO CELEBRATE
settings.text:
Rebel Alliance or Galactic Empire, light side or dark side of the Force, share your passion for the saga with your father and Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry.

Our new arrivals of the expanding galaxy of Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry bring the power of the dark side to an astonishing height. Black diamonds, blistering red garnets and the enticing designs inspired by Darth Vader™ himself will be your father’s new favorite in commanding style!

settings.authenticity_content:
Licensed Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry collection

Each piece is inspired by the iconic themes and imagery within the Star Wars galaxy and is handcrafted with high quality materials, impeccable workmanship and attention to detail. The exact metal content and Lucasfilm legal line are engraved on every piece.
settings.shipping_content:
SHIPPING POLICY

We offer free shipping & returns on all orders within the United States.

For orders outside the United States, an additional shipping charge of $35 is applicable on all orders. International returns have to be shipped by the customers to our Returns Fulfillment Center at their own cost.

 RETURN POLICY 

Online purchases can only be returned online. 

We kindly remind you that if for any reason you are not satisfied with the products purchased on our website, you may request a return within 30 days from delivery of the items. After 30 days, all sales are final. All returns must be received unaltered, unworn, and in the original condition with its original packaging. Any returns without its original packaging in mint condition will result in a $50 charge. Custom and engraved items are considered final sale and non-refundable.

All refunds will be issued in the original form of payment within 14 days from the date the return is received. Please contact our staff at StarWarsFineJewelry@renaissanceglobal.com or (947) 218 7827. 

Should you wish to make a return or exchange by mail, please contact us by email at StarWarsFineJewelry@renaissanceglobal.com or phone on (947) 218 7827 to make arrangements.
settings.shipping_content_ja:
配送ポリシー

米国内のすべての注文で送料無料の返品を提供しています。

米国以外での注文の場合、すべての注文に35ドルの追加送料が適用されます。国際返品は、お客様が自己負担で返品フルフィルメントセンターに発送する必要があります。

返品規則 

オンラインでの購入はオンラインでのみ返品できます。

何らかの理由で当社のウェブサイトで購入した商品にご満足いただけない場合は、商品の配送から30日以内に返品をリクエストすることができます。 30日後、すべての販売は最終的なものです。すべての返品は、変更せず、未使用で、元のパッケージの元の状態で受け取る必要があります。元のパッケージが未使用の状態で返品された場合は、50ドルの料金が発生します。カスタムおよび刻印されたアイテムは、最終販売と見なされ、返金不可です。

すべての払い戻しは、返品を受け取った日から14日以内に元の支払い方法で発行されます。 StarWarsFineJewelry@renaissanceglobal.com または（947）218 7827 。

メールでの返品または交換をご希望の場合は、メール StarWarsFineJewelry@renaissanceglobal.com または電話 (947）218 7827で手配します。

settings.paragraph: A classic bond of friendship, the loyal R2-D2™ and meticulous C-3PO™ are enduring companions involved in some of the galaxy’s most defining moments and thrilling battles. The “Friendship” collection is designed with droid-distinct details and iconic color cues. Join your friends and strengthen your alliance with the "Friendship" collection.

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by Han Solo™, the rogue smuggler and daring captain.
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by Princess Leia Organa™, the fearless royal Rebel and the irresistible bond of love.

settings.text: From rose gold and black rhodium, to blue sapphires and black diamonds, Find the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry styles you need for your next chapter this Valentine’s Day with our ‘His and Hers’ diamond rings.
settings.text_japanese: ローズゴールドからブラックロジウム、ブルーサファイアからブラックダイアモンドまで、Star Wars™ファインジュエリーのスタイルから、あなたの人生の次章になる指輪をこのバレンタインに、「彼と彼女」のダイアモンドリングから見つけませんか？

settings.paragraph: The Star Wars galaxy is as vast as it is varied, where personal choices spark profound influence. The “Into the Galaxy” collection with stellar highlights signifies an expansive tapestry of adventures and the symbol of Jedi protection to inspire limitless possibilities across the galaxy.
settings.paragraph_japanese: スターウォーズギャラクシーは多様で広大であり、個々人の選択が大きな影響を及ぼします。”ギャラクシーへ”は冒険の多様な展開を意味する星の様なハイライトとギャラクシーの終わりのない可能性を表したジェダイプロテクションのコレクションです。

settings.paragraph: Embark on this new journey with the lone gunfighter and the mysterious child. Designed to highlight The Mandalorian’s distinct armor and the details of GROGU.
settings.paragraph_japanese: 孤独なガンマンと謎の子供と共に、新しい旅立つ。マンダロリアンの独特の鎧とザ・チャイルドの詳細を強調したデザイン。

settings.title: JEWELRY CARE & ENHANCEMENT
settings.paragraph: Since 1857, Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry has maintained the highest standards in design, materials and craftsmanship, creating jewelry that has been passed down for generations. With proper care, you can preserve the beauty of your Enchanted jewelry for years to come.

settings.title: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away….
settings.paragraph: Introducing the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry collection,  inspired by classic Star Wars films. Also featuring a bonus capsule collection inspired by The Mandalorian™. The unique and exclusive assortment offers a variety of covetable fashion and bridal pieces, designed to embody the most iconic figures in the galaxy. Explore the finest diamond and gemstone collection each piece carefully crafted with exquisite detail.  Experience all Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry has to offer.  May the Force be with you.

settings.title: Jewelry Cleaning & Repair
settings.paragraph: Bring your Enchanted jewelry in for professional servicing to protect its beauty for years. From ring resizing and necklace repair to loose stones, our experts are knowledgeable and experienced in all aspects of jewelry care.

settings.article_title: Your eyes can deceive you. Don’t trust them.
